title: Important Messages and Alerts
message: These are the notifiations that either you or the A.I deem important

title: Alert Info Important Messages and Alerts
message: The red alert tells you how many new important messages you have

title: Your Timeline
message: This is where you view your current timeline, tasks, ToDo, and many other important things. It is based on the data you gave the A.I

title: Alert Info Your Timeline
message: The blue alert tells you how many things you're supposed to be working on right now

title: Listen to Me
message: Here, the A.I suggests you ways you can improve yourself, it also offers random advice

title: Alert Info Listen to Me
message: The green alert tells you how many new advice the A.I has for you

title: Settings
message: This is where you can change most of the data you registered with the A.I.

title: Alert Settings
message: The yellow alert tells you how many settings/fields that are yet to be completed by you

title: Get Started Intro
message:
Hello There
It seems this is the first time you're visiting this humble application. Use the button below to get started

*Note: This site uses local storage to save your data
Click the button above to grant permission to access

title: Get Started Name
message:
Name must be more than 2 characters
Name can't have more than 2 words
Previous

title: Get Started Age
message:
You have to be within the range of 5 to 95 years to continue
Previous

title: Get Started Gender
message:
You have to be above 5 years to continue
Previous

title: Get Started Finish
message:
Congratulations, you've completed the Sign Up.
In order to make the A.I more helpful, proceed to the settings page and finish the setup

title: Elementary Information
message: These are basic information about you, such as name, age and bio

title: Elementary Information - Name
message: This is the name field, make sure the name inserted is correct because it will be used for important queries in the future. It can't be less than 2 letters

title: Elementary Information - Call
message: Input the name that you want to be reffered to by the A.I here. It can't be more than 2 words

title: Elementary Information - Age
message: This is the Age Field. Note that you have to be above 5 and less than 95 to use this application

title: Elementary Information - Birthday
message: This is the Birthday section. Note that your date of birth will be caclculated from the product of this section and your age

title: Elementary Information - Birthday - Month
message: This is the month input, it is recommended to follow the suggestions provided by the field

title: Elementary Information - Birthday - Day
message: This is the Day input, it is recommended to follow the suggestions provided by the field

title: Elementary Information - Biography
message: Write a short but important piece of information about yourself in this field

title: Personal Preferences
message: This includes your personal preferences such as hobbies and sports

title: Personal Preferences - Hobbies
message: Include the things you love doing (hobbies) here, weather its a bad habbit or something extraordinary

title: Personal Preferences - Hobbies - Name
message: The name of the Hobby

title: Personal Preferences - Hobbies - Description
message: The description of the Hobby

title: Personal Preferences - Sports
message: Include the sports you love to watch, play or hear about

title: Personal Preferences - Hobbies - Name
message: The name of the Sport

title: Personal Preferences - Hobbies - Description
message: A short description of the Sport

title: Monetary Information
message: Information about your money is stored here. By filling this part correctly we will inform you when you are over spending and possibly try to help control the situation, of course only with your permission

title: Monetary Information - Monthly Income
message: Insert your average monthly income here. Make sure it is accurate so that we'll be able to know when your spendings are exceeding your income

title: Monetary Information - Daily Spending
message: Your average spending will be calculated from your daily input. But if you wish to ovewrite it, use this field

title: Monetary Information - Wealth Status
message: How do you consider yourself relative to the society around you

title: Employment Information
message: This section contains information about your work or important things (not necessarily bringing income) that you do

title: Employment Information - Employment Status
message: This describes your current employment status. Use 'Mixed' if you have multiple works with different status,

title: Employment Information - Looking for Job
message: If you're currently looking for a Job, fill in 'True' in this field

title: Employment Information - Works
message: This contains the different works that you perform

title: Employment Information - Works - Type
message: The name of the work you perform

title: Employment Information - Works - Place
message: The type of the work you perform

title: Location Information
message: This section contains information on your Current Location and Original (Birth) Loation

title: Location Information - Origin
message: Your Location of Origin, can also be called Birth Location

title: Location Information - Origin - Country
message: The country you originally come from

title: Location Information - Origin - State
message: The state you originally come from

title: Location Information - Current
message: Your Current Location, where you're currently situated

title: Location Information - Current - Country
message: The country where you currently reside

title: Location Information - Current - State
message: The state where you currently reside

title: Timeline Information
message: This section contains information about your day to day activites. This also includes your weekly, monthly or yearly activites

title: Timeline Information - Name
message: The name of the event you wish to register

title: Timeline Information - Days
message: The days you intend on performing the event

title: Timeline Information - Months
message: The months you intend on performing the event

title: Timeline Information - Time
message: The time in the day in whih the event is performed

title: Timeline Information - Description
message: A description of what the event entails

title: Timeline Information - Description
message: Your gender is displayed here

title: Others
message: Other Information

title: Others - Tasks
message: The difference between tasks and timeline is that tasks occur only once and in an instant, which means there is no time frame

title: Others - Tasks - Name
message: The name of the task

title: Others - Tasks - Day
message: The day the task will be performed

title: Others - Tasks - Month
message: The month the task will be performed

title: Others - Tasks - Time
message: The time the task will be performed

title: Others - Tasks - Description
message: The description of the task

title: Others - Tasks - Importance
message: Whether or not the task will be added to the important category
